GAs.description: Ability to apply knowledge of mathematics, science, and engineering.
Ability to design and conduct experiments, as well as to analyze and interpret data.
Ability to design a system, component, or process to meet desired needs.
Ability to function on multidisciplinary teams.
Understanding of professional and ethical responsibility.
Proficiency in communication skills, both oral and written.
Capacity for critical thinking and problem-solving.
Awareness of contemporary issues and their implications in relevant fields.
Ability to adapt to new technologies and methodologies.
Commitment to lifelong learning and professional development.
